ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Four
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Black Badges are invited to the compete in the Badge of Champions-a gigantic secret convention where scouts from competing disciplines meet every year for a cut-throat survival course. The objective is to win-no matter the cost.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Matt Kindt | 1 | Var | Mix Variant Cover | Tyler Jenkins & Hilary Jenkins | 2 | FOC | Unlocked Retailer Variant Cover | Raul Allen (a) & Patricia Martin (c) | 3 |
